Requirements You are in @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-adventures-in-etheirys.actions.Item.ymyhuyGwv8vEnLIH]{Iai Stance}

You cut the air with a great degree of force, generating cutting shockwaves. Each creature within a @Template[type:cone|distance:20] in the direction of your slash must make a @Check[reflex|against:dc] saving throw against your weapon's damage. This counts as unsheathing your blade, and you leave Iai Stance upon the conclusion of tenka goken as a result.

Critical Success The target takes no damage.

Success The target takes an amount of damage equal to the number of weapon damage dice, plus an additional two if you have legendary proficiency with the weapon.

Failure The target takes normal damage.

Critical Failure The target takes double damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1}.
